title: San Francisco/Golden Gate
name: Alegrias
directions: between Webster St and Fillmore St
content: Alegrias is a colorful, friendly, and romantic little Tapas bar in the Marina.  Like many other Tapas bars, it's a great place to go if you want to sample many flavors and tastes from small plates.  If you're still hungry after that, they have a more substantial main menu with plates like grilled lamb, paellas, and stewed rabbit.
